# Minimal .zshrc Template
# Place this in your ~/.zshrc file after installing Oh My Zsh
# All customization is in ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/

# Enable Powerlevel10k instant prompt (must be at the top)
if [[ -r "${XDG_CACHE_HOME:-$HOME/.cache}/p10k-instant-prompt-${(%):-%n}.zsh" ]]; then
  source "${XDG_CACHE_HOME:-$HOME/.cache}/p10k-instant-prompt-${(%):-%n}.zsh"
fi

# Path to Oh My Zsh installation
export ZSH="$HOME/.oh-my-zsh"

# Load custom configuration (plugins, theme, aliases, secrets)
source ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/zshrc

# P10k configuration (generated by p10k configure)
[[ ! -f ~/.p10k.zsh ]] || source ~/.p10k.zsh

# End of .zshrc - Keep it minimal!
# All other customizations should go in ~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/
